text:
Excellent food. Superb service.

I’m really happy we dined here! The food was so delicious. We got Kadai prawn, lamb rogan Josh, bandara kabab, onion bhaji, saffron rice and garlic naan.
The lamb was succulent and tender. The onion bhaji was super crispy but not oily.
My favorites were the prawns and chicken bandada kaban.- I will be dreaming of these 2 dishes!!

Affordable pricing, on drinks and food. We had excellent service by Pavav.

Highly recommend!!!

Pathetic experience.

We are family of 4 (2 adults and 2 kids) and visited for dinner on Sunday night.

First time saw that in an esteemed restaurant, staff was drinking alcohol openly instead of focusing on customer experience.

Order was delayed by 45-60 mins and kids were starving, even after that, all order including drinks, appetizers etc. was received incorrect, even though the restaurant was not crowded. Hence we have to left without eating anything despite long wait.

Very good butter chicken. Garlic naan is very fragrant and delicious. Good service, there is even an appetizer! (Some sort of chip and green herbal yogurt sauce) The chicken in the curry is also smokey and good quality. Don't waste time like us searching for Indian places!
very delicious and quality Indian food, generous with ingredients used, it’s really a hearty meal, thanks Pavan for your excellence in service. Will definitely visit again!
Top tasting North Indian food in Singapore, one of those hidden places. Was recommended to me by a good Indian friend. You wont be let down.
